revised_title: A Plan for Filtering Water Supply to the Metropolis and Suburbs
tldr: The author proposes a plan to supply filtered water to the metropolis and its suburbs by constructing a filtering chamber below the bed of the river Thames. The filtered water would be conducted through a main pipe or tunnel to a well, where it would be drawn up by steam power and distributed to the houses. The plan includes detailed instructions for constructing the filtering chamber and apparatus using materials such as brickwork, granite blocks, and layers of flints, sand, and gravel.
